original_text: Temple guards who were descendants of Shallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub, Hatita and Shobai: 138. Temple guards who were descendants of Shallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub, Hatita and Shobai: 138. korean_text: 문지기들은 살룸 자손과 아델 자손과 달문 자손과 악굽 자손과 하디다 자손과 소배 자손이 모두 백삼십팔 명이었느니라

sentences.original_text: Temple guards who were descendants of Shallum
